price: 156. Et parce qu’ils ont mécru et ont répandu contre Marie une ignoble calomnie.
arabic: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَٰنًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ʿalā maryama buh'tānan ʿaẓīman
